subject: Basketball
Traffic Accidents and Safety
Deaths (Fatalities)
lead_paragraph: A Georgia judge has set bond at $250,000 for the former N.B.A. player Mookie Blaylock, who was involved in a fatal car crash in suburban Atlanta.
snippet: A Georgia judge has set bond at $250,000 for the former N.B.A. player Mookie Blaylock, who was involved in a fatal car crash in suburban Atlanta.
